mosinstall.name: SlideShow
mosinstall.author: Rami Ben-Ami
mosinstall.description:
Thank you for Installing Rami's SlideShow Module...
To start using this module, In the Mambo/Joomla administrator control panel,
go to the modules menu, Find this module (SlideShow) and enter.
Set the module parameters to suit your needs.
and Enjoy...
Rami, Lady-beetle.com

param.name: type
param.label: Image Type
param.description: Type of image PNG/GIF/JPG etc. (default is JPG)

param.name: folder
param.label: Image Folder
param.description: Path to the image folder relative to the site url, eg: images/stories

param.name: link
param.label: Link
param.description: A URL to redirect to if image is clicked on, eg: http://www.lady-beetle.com

param.name: target
param.label: target
param.description: The link target. i.e.: to open the link in a new window, enter _blank, to open in the same window enter _self

param.name: credit
param.label: developer link
param.description: an option to credit the developer, with a small link to his site

param.name: border
param.label: border
param.description: The image border (in px). you can set it to 0 for no border

param.name: width
param.label: Width (px)
param.description: Image width (forces all images to be displayed with this width)

param.name: height
param.label: Height (px)
param.description: Image height (forces all images to be displayed with the height)

param.name: alt_line
param.label: alt line
param.description: Set a short line that will be used as a title/alt tag
